about.label: Official Chevrolet Dealer
about.p1: "Farg'ona Avtotexxizmat-F" LLC is the sole official dealer of the Chevrolet brand in Fergana region. We have been operating since 2009 and are recognized as a symbol of trust and quality in the automotive industry.
about.p2: Our company offers customers new car sales, official maintenance services, original spare parts supply, and Trade-In services. An individual approach to every customer is our core principle.
about.p3: In our showroom, you can see all current Chevrolet models, take a test drive, and purchase a car with convenient installment plans.

models.section_subtitle: The most popular Chevrolet models — choose and drive.

contact.title: Contact

footer.description: Providing you with the best cars and ensuring the highest level of service is our goal.

tracker.subtitle: Compact crossover
tracker.tagline: Bold design. Smart technology. Road confidence.
tracker.description: Chevrolet Tracker is a new generation urban crossover combining advanced technologies, striking design, and practical comfort. With a 1.2L turbo engine producing 132 hp and a 6th-speed automatic transmission, it easily adapts to both city rhythm and suburban trips.

Panorama lyuk.title: Panoramic Sunroof
Panorama lyuk.description: Panoramic glass sunroof makes the interior brighter

360° kamera.title: 360° Camera
360° kamera.description: Surround view camera system for easy parking

captiva.subtitle: Family crossover
captiva.description: Chevrolet Captiva is a spacious, technological SUV designed for everyday comfort and long journeys. With front-wheel drive, a turbo engine, and a smooth CVT transmission, Captiva offers the driver balanced efficiency and control. Available in 5nd- or 7nd-seat configurations.

traverse.name: Traverse
traverse.subtitle: 3-row crossover
traverse.tagline: A full member of your family
traverse.description: Chevrolet Traverse is a reliable crossover that will become a full member of your family. Built with advanced technologies, Traverse helps you achieve your biggest plans. Handsnd-free trunk release, wireless charging, 360-degree camera, and more.

Qo'lsiz bagaj.title: Handsnd-free Trunk
Qo'lsiz bagaj.description: Open the trunk with a simple kick motion under the bumper

Uzoq chiroq avto.title: Auto High Beam
Uzoq chiroq avto.description: Automatic adjustment when oncoming traffic is detected

traverse-z71.name: Traverse Z71
traverse-z71.subtitle: Off-road crossover
traverse-z71.description: Chevrolet Traverse Z71 is a powerful and spacious AWD SUV designed for active family life and confident driving in any road conditions. Equipped with a 328-hp 2.5L turbo gasoline engine and an 8nd-speed automatic transmission.

tahoe-rst.name: Tahoe RST
tahoe-rst.subtitle: Powerful full-size SUV
tahoe-rst.description: The new Chevrolet Tahoe is a legendary and large-size SUV, the embodiment of impressive power that belongs only to you. Powered by a 5.3L V8 with 343 hp, equipped with a 10nd-speed automatic and adaptive suspension.

tahoe-hc.name: Tahoe High Country
tahoe-hc.subtitle: Premium full-size SUV
tahoe-hc.description: The new Chevrolet Tahoe High Country 2025 is a legendary full-size SUV. Equipped with a 420nd-hp 6.2L V8 engine, 10th-speed automatic, and adaptive air suspension.

onix.subtitle: Modern sedan
onix.description: Chevrolet Onix is a new model combining bright design, modern interior, and all necessary options for comfort and safety. An economical and modern sedan, perfect for urban life.

cobalt-mcm.subtitle: Updated sedan
cobalt-mcm.description: Chevrolet Cobalt MCM is an updated version of the popular Cobalt model. Featuring modern design, improved safety systems, and comfort. A reliable sedan adapted for the roads of Uzbekistan.

cobalt.subtitle: Budget sedan
cobalt.description: Chevrolet Cobalt is a subcompact front-wheel-drive sedan with neutral design, ergonomic and comfortable interior according to European B-segment standards, featuring time-tested technical filling.

AC.title: Air Conditioning
AC.description: Maintains a pleasant temperature in the cabin

malibu-xl.subtitle: Business sedan
malibu-xl.description: Malibu XL 2023 is designed for the urban environment and combines the most modern design, technology, quality, and safety. A bold, confident, and attractive appearance is combined with a spacious and luxurious interior. Flagship sedan of the middle and high class.

labo.subtitle: Light truck
labo.description: Chevrolet Labo is a reliable light commercial vehicle designed for small business and everyday cargo transportation. Ideal choice for small entrepreneurs due to economical fuel consumption and affordable price.

Commercial.title: Commercial
Commercial.description: Best face for urban cargo transportation

Payload.title: Payload
Payload.description: Ability to carry up to 550 kg

damas.subtitle: Minivan
damas.description: Chevrolet Damas is one of the most popular minivans in Uzbekistan. Reliable and economical commercial transport for carrying cargo and passengers. Compact dimensions make city driving easy.

Ikki funksiya.title: Dual Function
Ikki funksiya.description: Ability to carry both cargo and passengers

damas-move-max.subtitle: Updated minivan
damas-move-max.description: Damas Move & Max is a reinforced version of the classic Damas model. Featuring an updated engine, improved interior, and modern design. A reliable choice for small business and families.

Kuchli dvigatel.title: Powerful Engine
Kuchli dvigatel.description: 1.2L engine — more powerful than standard Damas

chevrolet-tracker-2026-yangilangan-versi.title: Chevrolet Tracker 2026 — updated version presented
chevrolet-tracker-2026-yangilangan-versi.excerpt: In the Farg'ona Avtotexxizmat-F showroom, the updated 2026 version of the Tracker was officially presented. The new model features modern design and expanded features.
chevrolet-tracker-2026-yangilangan-versi.content:
In the Farg'ona Avtotexxizmat-F showroom, the updated 2026 version of the Tracker was officially presented. The new model features modern design and expanded features. This model has further increased comfort for the driver and passengers.

The new Tracker has the following changes:

  • Updated front grille and LED headlights.
  • Expanded multimedia system and digital instrument panel.
  • Improved safety systems, including automatic park assist.
  • New generation engine with increased fuel efficiency.

You can purchase the car at our dealership today. For more information, please contact us.

foizsiz-muddatli-tolov-2026-yanvar.title: Interest-free installment: January 2026 opportunities
foizsiz-muddatli-tolov-2026-yanvar.excerpt: In January, there is an opportunity to purchase Chevrolet cars with 0% interest installments.
foizsiz-muddatli-tolov-2026-yanvar.content:
In January, an opportunity is provided to purchase Chevrolet cars in installments with 0% interest. Within this campaign, you have access to:

  • Special conditions for Chevrolet Onix and Tracker models.
  • Down payment starts from 30%.
  • Payment period up to 18 months interest-free.

Promotion period is limited. Hurry to take advantage of the opportunity!

chevrolet-tahoe-2026-kuchli-v8.title: Chevrolet Tahoe 2026: powerful V8 and new Premium package
chevrolet-tahoe-2026-kuchli-v8.excerpt: The new generation of Tahoe has arrived with a 5.3L V8 engine and updated multimedia system.
chevrolet-tahoe-2026-kuchli-v8.content:
The new generation of Tahoe has arrived with a 5.3L V8 engine and updated multimedia system. This is a true combination of power and luxury.

What's new in the model?

  • 5.3L V8 Ecotec3 engine, 355 hp.
  • 10-speed automatic transmission.
  • Premium leather interior and wood trim.
  • Magnetic Ride Control suspension.

Call now to sign up for a Test Drive.

trade-in-xizmati-eski-avtomobilingizni-y.title: Trade-In service: exchange your old car for a new one
trade-in-xizmati-eski-avtomobilingizni-y.excerpt: We accept your car of any brand at market price and help you buy a new Chevrolet.
trade-in-xizmati-eski-avtomobilingizni-y.content:
Exchanging your old car for a new Chevrolet through the Trade-In program is now even easier. We will evaluate your car at market price and deduct this amount from the price of the new car.

Benefits:

  • Fast evaluation and processing.
  • Fair valuation at market price.
  • Free yourself from the worries of selling your old car.
  • You can drive away in a new car on the same day.

For more information, please contact the Trade-In department.
